verses.verse: Then we turned <WH6437>, and went up <WH5927> the way <WH1870> to Bashan <WH1316>: and Og <WH5747> the king <WH4428> of Bashan <WH1316> came out <WH3318> against <WH7125> us <WH5971>, he and all his people, unto battle <WH4421> at Edrei <WH154>.

And Jehovah <WH3068> said <WH559> unto me <WH3372>, Fear him not <WH5414>; for I have delivered him <WH5971>, and all his people, and his land <WH776>, into thy hand <WH3027>; and thou shalt do <WH6213> unto him as thou didst <WH6213> unto Sihon <WH5511> king <WH4428> of the Amorites <WH567>, who dwelt <WH3427> at Heshbon <WH2809>.

So Jehovah <WH3068> our God <WH430> delivered <WH5414> into our hand <WH3027> Og <WH5747> also <WH4428>, the king of Bashan <WH1316>, and all his people <WH5971>: and we smote <WH5221> him until none was left <WH7604> to him remaining <WH8300>.

And we took <WH3920> all his cities <WH5892> at that time <WH6256>; there was not a city <WH7151> which we took <WH3947> not from them <WH8346>; threescore cities <WH5892>, all the region <WH2256> of Argob <WH709>, the kingdom <WH4467> of Og <WH5747> in Bashan <WH1316>.
All these were cities <WH5892> fortified <WH1219> with high <WH1364> walls <WH2346>, gates <WH1817>, and bars <WH1280>; besides the unwalled <WH6521> towns <WH5892> a great <WH3966> many <WH7235>.

And we utterly destroyed <WH2763> them <WH6213>, as we did unto Sihon <WH5511> king <WH4428> of Heshbon <WH2809>, utterly destroying <WH2763> every inhabited <WH4962> city <WH5892>, with the women <WH802> and the little ones <WH2945>.
But all the cattle <WH929>, and the spoil <WH7998> of the cities <WH5892>, we took for a prey unto ourselves <WH962>.

And we took <WH3947> the land <WH776> at that time <WH6256> out <WH3947> of the hand <WH3027> of the two <WH8147> kings <WH4428> of the Amorites <WH567> that were beyond <WH5676> the Jordan <WH3383>, from the valley <WH5158> of the Arnon <WH769> unto mount <WH2022> Hermon <WH2768>;
<WH2768>( which Hermon the Sidonians <WH6722> call <WH7121> Sirion <WH8303>, and the Amorites <WH567> call <WH7121> it Senir <WH8149>;)

all the cities <WH5892> of the plain <WH4334>, and all Gilead <WH1568>, and all Bashan <WH1316>, unto Salecah <WH5548> and Edrei <WH154>, cities <WH5892> of the kingdom <WH4467> of Og <WH5747> in Bashan <WH1316>.

(For only Og <WH5747> king <WH4428> of Bashan <WH1316> remained <WH7604> of the remnant <WH3499> of the Rephaim <WH7497>; behold <WH6210>, his bedstead was a bedstead <WH6210> of iron <WH1270>; is it not <WH3808> in Rabbah <WH7237> of the children <WH1121> of Ammon <WH5983>? nine <WH8672> cubits <WH520> was the length <WH753> thereof <WH702>, and four cubits <WH520> the breadth <WH7341> of it <WH520>, after the cubit of a man <WH376>.)

And this land <WH776> we took in possession <WH3423> at that time <WH6256>: from Aroer <WH6177>, which is by the valley <WH5158> of the Arnon <WH769>, and half <WH2677> the hill-country <WH2022> of Gilead <WH1568>, and the cities <WH5892> thereof <WH5414>, gave I unto the Reubenites <WH7206> and to the Gadites <WH1425>:

and the rest <WH3499> of Gilead <WH1568>, and all Bashan <WH1316>, the kingdom <WH4467> of Og <WH5747>, gave <WH5414> I unto the half <WH2677> - tribe <WH7626> of Manasseh <WH4519>; all the region <WH2256> of Argob <WH709>, even all Bashan <WH1316>. (The same <WH1931> is called <WH7121> the land <WH776> of Rephaim <WH7497>.

Jair <WH2971> the son <WH1121> of Manasseh <WH4519> took <WH3947> all the region <WH2256> of Argob <WH709>, unto the border <WH1366> of the Geshurites <WH1651> and the Maacathites <WH4602>, and called <WH7121> them <WH1316>, even Bashan, after his own name <WH8034>, Havvoth-jair <WH3117>, unto this day.)
And I gave <WH5414> Gilead <WH1568> unto Machir <WH4353>.

And unto the Reubenites <WH7206> and unto the Gadites <WH1425> I gave <WH5414> from Gilead <WH1568> even unto the valley <WH5158> of the Arnon <WH769>, the middle <WH8432> of the valley <WH5158>, and the border <WH1366> thereof <WH5158>, even unto the river Jabbok <WH2999>, which is the border <WH1366> of the children <WH1121> of Ammon <WH5983>;

the Arabah <WH6160> also <WH3383>, and the Jordan and the border <WH1366> thereof <WH3672>, from Chinnereth even unto the sea <WH3220> of the Arabah <WH6160>, the Salt <WH4417> Sea <WH3220>, under the slopes of Pisgah <WH798> eastward <WH4217>.

And I commanded <WH6680> you at that time <WH6256>, saying <WH559>, Jehovah <WH3068> your God <WH430> hath given <WH5414> you this land <WH776> to possess <WH3423> it <WH5674>: ye shall pass over armed <WH2502> before <WH6440> your brethren <WH251> the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478>, all the men <WH1121> of valor <WH2428>.

But your wives <WH802>, and your little ones <WH2945>, and your cattle <WH4735>, (I know <WH3045> that ye have much <WH7227> cattle <WH4735>,) shall abide <WH3427> in your cities <WH5892> which I have given you <WH5414>,

until Jehovah <WH3068> give rest <WH5117> unto your brethren <WH251>, as unto you <WH3423>, and they also possess the land <WH776> which Jehovah <WH3068> your God <WH430> giveth <WH5414> them beyond <WH5676> the Jordan <WH3383>: then shall ye return <WH7725> every man <WH376> unto his possession <WH3425>, which I have given you <WH5414>.

And I commanded <WH6680> Joshua <WH3091> at that time <WH6256>, saying <WH559>, Thine eyes <WH5869> have seen <WH7200> all that Jehovah <WH3068> your God <WH430> hath done <WH6213> unto these two <WH8147> kings <WH4428>: so shall Jehovah <WH3068> do <WH6213> unto all the kingdoms <WH4467> whither thou goest over <WH5674>.
Ye shall not fear <WH3372> them <WH3068>; for Jehovah your God <WH430>, he it is that fighteth for you <WH3898>.
And I besought <WH2603> Jehovah <WH3068> at that time <WH6256>, saying <WH559>,

O Lord <WH136> Jehovah <WH3069>, thou hast begun <WH2490> to show <WH7200> thy servant <WH5650> thy greatness <WH1433>, and thy strong <WH2389> hand <WH3027>: for what god <WH410> is there in heaven <WH8064> or in earth <WH776>, that can do <WH6213> according to thy works <WH4639>, and according to thy mighty acts <WH1369>?
Let me go over <WH5674>, I pray thee <WH7200>, and see the good <WH2896> land <WH776> that is beyond <WH5676> the Jordan <WH3383>, that goodly <WH2896> mountain <WH2022>, and Lebanon <WH3844>.

But Jehovah <WH3068> was wroth <WH5674> with me for your sakes <WH8085>, and hearkened not unto me <WH3068>; and Jehovah said <WH559> unto me <WH7227>, Let it suffice thee <WH1696>; speak no more <WH3254> unto me of this matter <WH1697>.

Get thee up <WH5927> unto the top <WH7218> of Pisgah <WH6449>, and lift up <WH5375> thine eyes <WH5869> westward <WH3220>, and northward <WH6828>, and southward <WH8486>, and eastward <WH4217>, and behold <WH7200> with thine eyes <WH5869>: for thou shalt not go over <WH5674> this Jordan <WH3383>.

But charge <WH6680> Joshua <WH3091>, and encourage <WH2388> him <WH553>, and strengthen him <WH5674>; for he shall go over before <WH6440> this people <WH5971>, and he shall cause them to inherit <WH5157> the land <WH776> which thou shalt see <WH7200>.
So we abode <WH3427> in the valley <WH1516> over against <WH4136> Beth-peor <WH1047>.
